snippet: Tarkanian showed that what we want from our college coaches are, mostly, wins and entertainment.
abstract: John Branch On College Basketball column remembers acclaimed Nevada-Las Vegas coach Jerry Tarkanian, who died coincidentally within days of revered North Carolina coach Dean Smith; acknowledges Tarkanian for his win-at-all-costs approach that appealed to many fans.
lead_paragraph: Tarkanian showed that what we want from our college coaches are, mostly, wins and entertainment.

headline.print_headline: Part Villain, Part Victim, Tarkanian Simply Won
headline.main: Part Villain, Part Victim, Jerry Tarkanian Simply Won
